issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Found in 0.6.0

If the attachment argument in dlg.addAttachment is an image blob which contains a content url, the image fails to attach correctly because the mimeType was not found using a content resolver.

Also due to a change before release of 0.6.0 the addAttachment method gets an undefined error because it was expecting an object of the form {file: } not just or string.

{html}
fields.summary: EmailDialog not handing content urls correctly. (Android)

{html}
